```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
View(mtcars)
```


```{r}
Plot1 = ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = hp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(size = 6,
             color = "red",
             alpha = .6) +
  labs(title = "Relation Between Horsepower & Miles Per Gallon",
       x = "Horsepower",
       y = "MPG") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12))


ggsave(filename = "scatter-plot-1.png", 
       plot = Plot1, 
       width = 9.375,
       height = 6.25, 
       units = "in",
       path = "../../project/images/output-images")
Plot1
```
